headline: National Consumer Protection Week: PG&E Partners with the FTC to Help Customers Recognize and Avoid Utility Scams
summary: During 2024, Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E) customers lost nearly $650,000 to utility scammers. To help combat this alarming trend, PG&E is joining the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) to help customers recognize and avoid potential scams during National Consumer Protection Week from March 2-8, 2025.
